evidence_example.title: OIL Event
evidence_example.small_descr: This example shows the following task related primitives: SetEvent, ClearEvent, WaitEvent, SetRelAlarm, as well as ORTI support for Trace32.
evidence_example.long_descr: This example shows the following task related primitives: SetEvent, ClearEvent, WaitEvent, SetRelAlarm, as well as ORTI support for Trace32.
